[00:23.190]
[00:23.890]Yo picture this
[00:25.230]U got a kid in a room
[00:26.710]his hands sweatin and shakin while he's lacin his shoes
[00:29.450]the excitement's buildin up for what's comin up soon
[00:32.790]To get there and do what he was born to do
[00:34.510]
[00:35.510]他拥有篮球梦
[00:36.790]他成为地狱修罗
[00:38.420]他知道全盘战局只能够靠自己掌控
[00:41.230]虽感到一点疲倦
[00:42.580]虽感到一些危险
[00:44.040]但是在胜负分明之前绝对不会退却
[00:46.720]
[00:46.820]Cuz now he's out on the floor
[00:48.370]And he's catchin the pass
[00:49.940]slashin to the glass, movin so fast, right to the hole,
[00:52.810]they don't know how to stop him
[00:54.580]and he keeps on droppin
[00:56.250]2's and 3's by the second
[00:57.730]and the crowd is rockin
[00:59.100]so they knock him
[01:00.570]躺在冰冷地上
